data.name: ConnectionString
data.value: Database={0}; Data Source={1}; Port={2}; User Id={3}; Password={4};

data.name: Error_Connecting
data.value: Error connecting to the MySQL server. You should restart the game and MySQL server.

data.name: NonQuery_Delete_Character_Delete
data.value: DELETE FROM `characters` WHERE accountid = @accountid AND name = @name

data.name: NonQuery_Delete_Character_SetOffline
data.value: DELETE FROM `online_characters` WHERE charid = @charid

data.name: NonQuery_Delete_OnlineAccounts_SetAllOffline
data.value: DELETE FROM `online_accounts`

data.name: NonQuery_Delete_OnlineAccounts_SetOffline
data.value: DELETE FROM `online_accounts` WHERE accountid = @accountid

data.name: NonQuery_Delete_OnlineCharacters_SetAllOffline
data.value: DELETE FROM `online_characters`

data.name: NonQuery_Delete_StatisticsOverall_DeleteByCharId
data.value: DELETE FROM `character_statistics` WHERE charid = @charid

data.name: NonQuery_Delete_StatisticsWeekly_DeleteByCharId
data.value: DELETE FROM `character_statistics_weekly` WHERE charid = @charid

data.name: NonQuery_InsertUpdate_OnlineCharacters_SetOnline
data.value: INSERT INTO `online_characters` (charid, tableid, arenaid, arenashortname) VALUES (@charid, @tableid, @arenaid, @arenashortname) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tableid=@tableid, arenaid=@arenaid, arenashortname=@arenashortname

data.name: NonQuery_InsertUpdate_StatisticsOverall_Update
data.value: INSERT INTO `character_statistics` (charid, hidden, kills, deaths, raises, damagedone, damagetaken, healingdone, healingtaken, wins, losses) VALUES (@charid, @hidden, @kills, @deaths, @raises, @damagedone, @damagetaken, @healingdone, @healingtaken, @wins, @losses) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE hidden=@hidden, kills=kills+@kills, deaths=deaths+@deaths, raises=raises+@raises, damagedone=damagedone+@damagedone, damagetaken=damagetaken+@damagetaken, healingdone=healingdone+@healingdone, healingtaken=healingtaken+@healingtaken, wins=wins+@wins, losses=losses+@losses

data.name: NonQuery_InsertUpdate_StatisticsWeekly_Update
data.value: INSERT INTO `character_statistics_weekly` (charid, date, hidden, kills, deaths, raises, damagedone, damagetaken, healingdone, healingtaken, wins, losses) VALUES (@charid, @date, @hidden, @kills, @deaths, @raises, @damagedone, @damagetaken, @healingdone, @healingtaken, @wins, @losses) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE hidden=@hidden, kills=kills+@kills, deaths=deaths+@deaths, raises=raises+@raises, damagedone=@damagedone+@damagedone, damagetaken=damagetaken+@damagetaken, healingdone=healingdone+@healingdone, healingtaken=healingtaken+@healingtaken, wins=wins+@wins, losses=losses+@losses

data.name: NonQuery_Insert_Character_SaveNew
data.value: INSERT INTO `characters` (accountid, slot, name, agility, constitution, memory, reasoning, discipline, empathy, intuition, presence, quickness, strength, spent_stat, bonus_stat, bonus_spent, list_1, list_2, list_3, list_4, list_5, list_6, list_7, list_8, list_9, list_10, list_level_1, list_level_2, list_level_3, list_level_4, list_level_5, list_level_6, list_level_7, list_level_8, list_level_9, list_level_10, class, level, spell_picks, model, experience, spell_key_1, spell_key_2, spell_key_3, spell_key_4, spell_key_5, spell_key_6, spell_key_7, spell_key_8, spell_key_9, spell_key_10, spell_key_11, spell_key_12, oplevel, flags) VALUES (@accountid, @slot, @name, @agility, @constitution, @memory, @reasoning, @discipline, @empathy, @intuition, @presence, @quickness, @strength, @spent_stat, @bonus_stat, @bonus_spent, @list_1, @list_2, @list_3, @list_4, @list_5, @list_6, @list_7, @list_8, @list_9, @list_10, @list_level_1, @list_level_2, @list_level_3, @list_level_4, @list_level_5, @list_level_6, @list_level_7, @list_level_8, @list_level_9, @list_level_10, @class, @level, @spell_picks, @model, @experience, @spell_key_1, @spell_key_2, @spell_key_3, @spell_key_4, @spell_key_5, @spell_key_6, @spell_key_7, @spell_key_8, @spell_key_9, @spell_key_10, @spell_key_11, @spell_key_12, @oplevel, @flags)

data.name: NonQuery_Insert_Matches_New
data.value: INSERT INTO `matches` (arenaid, tableid, creation_time, player_count, highest_player_count, max_players, current_state, end_state, short_name, long_name, founder_charid, duration, level_range, mode, rules) VALUES (@arenaid, @tableid, @creation_time, @player_count, @highest_player_count, @max_players, @current_state, @end_state, @short_name, @long_name, @founder_charid, @duration, @level_range, @mode, @rules)

data.name: NonQuery_Insert_OnlineAccounts_SetOnline
data.value: INSERT INTO `online_accounts` (accountid) VALUES (@accountid)

data.name: NonQuery_Update_Character_SaveExisting
data.value: UPDATE `characters` SET name=@name, agility=@agility, constitution=@constitution, memory=@memory, reasoning=@reasoning, discipline=@discipline, empathy=@empathy, intuition=@intuition, presence=@presence, quickness=@quickness, strength=@strength, spent_stat=@spent_stat, bonus_stat=@bonus_stat, bonus_spent=@bonus_spent, list_1=@list_1, list_2=@list_2, list_3=@list_3, list_4=@list_4, list_5=@list_5, list_6=@list_6, list_7=@list_7, list_8=@list_8, list_9=@list_9, list_10=@list_10, list_level_1=@list_level_1, list_level_2=@list_level_2, list_level_3=@list_level_3, list_level_4=@list_level_4, list_level_5=@list_level_5, list_level_6=@list_level_6, list_level_7=@list_level_7, list_level_8=@list_level_8, list_level_9=@list_level_9, list_level_10=@list_level_10, experience=@experience, class=@class, level=@level, spell_picks=@spell_picks, model=@model, spell_key_1=@spell_key_1, spell_key_2=@spell_key_2, spell_key_3=@spell_key_3, spell_key_4=@spell_key_4, spell_key_5=@spell_key_5, spell_key_6=@spell_key_6, spell_key_7=@spell_key_7, spell_key_8=@spell_key_8, spell_key_9=@spell_key_9, spell_key_10=@spell_key_10, spell_key_11=@spell_key_11, spell_key_12=@spell_key_12, oplevel=@oplevel, flags=@flags WHERE accountid=@accountid AND slot=@slot

data.name: NonQuery_Update_ServerSettings_SetExpMultiplier
data.value: UPDATE `server_settings` SET exp_multiplier = @exp_multiplier

data.name: Query_Select_Account_IsSerialBanned
data.value: SELECT `serial` FROM `banned_serials` WHERE serial = @serial LIMIT 1

data.name: Query_Select_Character_FindByAccountIdAndSlot
data.value: SELECT * FROM `characters` WHERE accountid = @accountid AND slot = @slot LIMIT 1

data.name: Query_Select_Character_FindByName
data.value: SELECT * FROM `characters` WHERE name = @name LIMIT 1

data.name: Query_Select_Character_FindByNameAndAccountId
data.value: SELECT * FROM `characters` WHERE name = @name AND accountid = @accountid LIMIT 1

data.name: Query_Select_Study_GetHighScoreList
data.value: SELECT * FROM `characters` WHERE class = @class AND oplevel = 0 ORDER BY `experience` DESC LIMIT 10
